title: Mayor Durkan & Councilmember Mosqueda announce Seattle Rescue Plan
description:
View the City of Seattle's commenting policy: seattle.gov/online-comment-policy

Mayor Jenny A. Durkan and Seattle City Councilmember Teresa Mosqueda announce the "Seattle Rescue Plan," a $128.4 million package in federal recovery funds to aid Seattle's recovery from the pandemic and COVID-related economic impacts. The Seattle Rescue Plan includes $116 million in Coronavirus Local Fiscal Recovery funds in direct aid provided from the Federal American Rescue Plan Act (ARPA), as well as $12.2 million of HOME Investment Partnerships Program funds.
Speakers include:
Mayor Jenny A. Durkan, City of Seattle
Teresa Mosqueda, Seattle City Councilmember
Velma Veloria, former Washington State Representative
Angie Hicks-Maxie, Owner of Tiny Tots Childcare
